evaluatorInfo.title: Execution of JavaScript code
evaluatorInfo.body:
If a snippet is recognized as JavaScript, it can be executed directly in the browser.

For security reasons, the script runs in a sandbox environment.
This means that not all JavaScript features such as external URLs, or session information are available.

The sandbox also allows to interrupt scripts, even if they are stuck in a continuous loop.

Despite the security measures, the possibility of being compromised by foreign JavaScript code cannot be excluded.
Please therefore only execute code that you have read completely.
